mapper.sql: select T.ROW_ID as id, date_format(T.CREATED,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as created, T.CREATED_BY as createdBy, date_format(T.LAST_UPD, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as lastUpdated, T.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy, T.product_pic_id as productPicId, T2.path as productPic, T.product_pic_type as productPicType, T.comments as comments, T.product_id as productId
from lnk_product_detail T left join cx_o_img t2 on t.product_pic_id = t2.row_id
mapper.insert: insert into lnk_product_detail (ROW_ID, product_pic_id, product_pic_type, comments,product_id) values (#{id},#{productPicId},#{productPicType},#{comments},#{productId})
